references.paper_title: Semi-Supervised Classification with Graph Convolutional Networks
references.reason: This paper is foundational for many graph neural network approaches used in graph anomaly detection, introducing the graph convolutional network architecture.
This paper introduced graph attention networks, another important building block for graph neural networks used in many anomaly detection methods.

references.paper_title: Deep anomaly detection on attributed networks
references.reason: This paper is one of the earliest works applying deep learning to graph anomaly detection, demonstrating the potential of this approach.

references.paper_title: GADBench: Revisiting and Benchmarking Supervised Graph Anomaly Detection
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive benchmark dataset for graph anomaly detection, facilitating better comparison and evaluation of different methods.

references.paper_title: Anomaly Detection on Attributed Networks via Contrastive Self-Supervised Learning
references.reason: This paper introduces a contrastive self-supervised learning method for anomaly detection, showcasing a promising technique for unsupervised learning in this domain.
